snippet.title: Sail Forth Trailer | Coming 2022!
snippet.description:
Heave! Fake the bull rope and stay the mizzen royal! Command a fleet of custom-rigged sailing ships on a procedurally crafted adventure over an unending ocean whose ancient depths have swallowed the key to a planet’s mysterious past. The Deepblue calls with the bellow of High Adventure! Sail Forth!

Sail Forth is coming to Nintendo Switch, Xbox One and Series X|S, PlayStation 4 and 5, and Steam in 2022!

Wishlist Sail Forth on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1031460/Sail_Forth?utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=storytrailer
Follow Sail Forth on Twitter: https://twitter.com/sailforthgame
Follow QAG on Twitter: https://twitter.com/QuantumApG

Experience the Deepblue!
Put the wind to your back and cast out into High Adventure over a vast ocean spanning numerous unique regions, each packed to bursting with its own flora, fauna, and ambient music. Make chase with a pod of curious dolphins, watch the sun sink into an icy horizon, run down a clutch of cowardly privateers and accept their apologies to the tune of wild cannonry.

Fathom a Mystery!
It’s said, by some, that the Deepblue was once an endless breadth of sand and steel and tall-tops and glitter-brittle, and that the ocean’s weight belched up from the smoulder and crush of an ancient secret, an Iron Maelstrom, a Famine of the Sky. What will you uncover on your cut across the crest and baffle of the ‘blue? Will your adventure win you answers? Will you discover the riddle of the sea?

Fire All Guns!
There’s war on the water, and it’s up to you to outfit your ship and make ready to stove and shatter any pirate, privateer, or sea monster martial enough to shiver your timbers. Buy, equip, upgrade, and modify your ships’ armament to suit your play-style.

Command a Fleet!
Why captain a single ship when you can marshal an entire flotilla? Build, manage, and modify a custom cadre of unique and specialized vessels to match your own personality and play-style.

Re-Live Adventure!
Stay engaged with a replayable rogue-lite experience whose narrative is revealed through free exploration in an ocean-world of ever-changing discovery. Lean into a chill sailing session or wage raging war on the cracking waves. On the Deepblue, opportunity is in every direction, and sinking your ship is just the start of another adventure!
